sentences.en: He can and should delegate tactical responsibility.
He had a nose for trouble and a brilliant tactical mind.
sentences.cn: 他善于发现问题，还总能想出高明的策略。

sentences.en: I think he made a tactical blunder by announcing it so far ahead of time.
sentences.cn: 我认为他在时机远未成熟时就把这事说了出去是一种失策。

sentences.en: In a few hours the tactical problem began to fall into shape.
sentences.cn: 会议开始几小时后,策略问题已露出了端倪.

sentences.en: It was a nice tactical problem, whether she should ever ask him.
sentences.cn: 她可不可以自己问他呢,这倒是个很费思量的问题.

sentences.en: Once he was launched on a course, Nixon's determination was equal to his tactical resourcefulness.
sentences.cn: 尼克松一旦开始执行一项方针, 他的决心之大同他的多谋善断是不相上下的.

sentences.en: Our own best tactical concepts, skillfully turned against us.
sentences.cn: 我们自己最精湛的战术概念, 被巧妙地运用了来反击我们.

sentences.en: Tactical nuclear weapons have shorter ranges.
sentences.cn: 战术核武器的威力范围较小。

sentences.en: The campaign was widely criticised for making tactical mistakes and for a lack of coherence.
sentences.cn: 竞选运动由于犯了战术性错误和缺乏连贯性而广受批评。

sentences.en: The four tactical armies , into which the ground forces were divided, varied in numerical strength.
sentences.cn: 当时地面部队区分为实力不同的四个战术军团.

sentences.en: The Kenyan athlete made a tactical error in starting too fast.
sentences.cn: 肯尼亚运动员犯了战术错误,起步时跑得太快.

sentences.en: The police tactical unit must follow other forces quickly.
sentences.cn: 警察当局的战术小组必须迅速赶上其他队伍.

sentences.en: The security forces had made a tactical withdrawal from the area.
sentences.cn: 安全部队已从该地区战术性撤军。

sentences.en: They have removed all tactical nuclear missiles that could strike Europe.
sentences.cn: 他们已经拆除所有能够袭击欧洲的战术核导弹。

sentences.en: Two players were substituted for tactical reasons .
sentences.cn: 两名球员因战术需要被替换下场。

trans.tran_cn: 战术的，策略上的，巧妙设计的，有谋略的
trans.tran_en: relating to what you do to achieve what you want, especially as part of a game or large plan
